DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize clinical trial measure outcome 6-months post-intervention . The objective study evaluate outcome two different group intervention Veterans Chronic Multisymptom Illness ( CMI ) . The intervention compare Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction adapt version Chronic Disease Self-Management Program ( aCDSMP ) Veterans experience symptom Chronic Multi-Symptom Illness ( CMI ) - musculoskeletal pain , fatigue , cognitive failure - especially deploy Gulf War I. Hypothesis One ( : Outcomes ) : Participants randomize adapt Chronic Disease Self-Management Program ( aCDSMP ) derive benefit primary outcome , small effect participant randomize Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction ( MBSR ) . The investigator hypothesize Veterans randomize MBSR report great reduction three primary outcome measure ( pain , fatigue , cognitive failure ) 6-month follow-up compare aCDSMP . Hypothesis Two ( : Acceptability ) : MBSR acceptable satisfactory program Veterans CMI , measure attendance rate , self-report measure satisfaction , qualitative interview . The investigator hypothesize Veterans CMI randomize MBSR report great satisfaction care peer randomize aCDSMP .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator enroll 308 participant . Half Gulf War Veterans meet criterion CMI , half Veterans period service also meet criterion CMI . Each participant randomize either participate MBSR aCDSMP ( stratified Gulf War deployment status ~7-8 Gulf War Veterans group every cohort ) . Measures collect primary outcome data ( pain , fatigue , cognitive failure , patient satisfaction ) , secondary outcome , potential mediator administer four assessment : ( 1 ) Baseline ; ( 2 ) Post-Intervention ; ( 3 ) 3-months group end ; ( 4 ) 6-months group end . Sample demographic data ( age , gender , race , income , education , etc . ) collect baseline . All study procedure take place VA Puget Sound Health Care System Seattle , WA .
DOC.criteria: Selfreport criterion Chronic MultiSymptom Illness Fluent English able provide inform consent Currently drink pastyear history alcoholrelated seizure delirium tremens Current DMSV substance use disorder cannabis nicotine Moderate high risk suicide assess MINI Current psychotic disorder Current manic episode Diagnosis borderline personality disorder antisocial personality disorder Inpatient admittance psychiatric reason past month Prior participation MBSR CDSMP ( attend least one session )
